products.title: Black Short
products.description: Comfortable black shorts made from lightweight, breathable fabric. Perfect for casual wear, workouts, or summer activities. Features an elastic waistband and side pockets for convenience.

products.title: Men Travel Bag
products.description: Durable and spacious travel bag designed for short trips or daily commutes. Made with high-quality materials, multiple compartments, and comfortable straps for easy carrying.

products.title: Sport Backpack
products.description: Lightweight and stylish sport backpack suitable for gym, outdoor activities, or school. Includes multiple pockets, water bottle holder, and padded straps for comfort.

products.title: Casual Men's Shoes
products.description: Classic casual shoes for men, offering comfort and style. Perfect for everyday wear, made with durable material and cushioned soles for long-lasting comfort.

products.title: Summer Baseball Cap
products.description: Trendy baseball cap ideal for sunny days. Lightweight, adjustable, and made from breathable fabric to keep you cool and stylish.

products.title: Apple Watch
products.description: Smart Apple Watch with fitness tracking, notifications, and customizable watch faces. Perfect for keeping track of health and staying connected on the go.

products.title: Trendy Sunglasses
products.description: Fashionable sunglasses with UV protection. Lightweight, durable frame and stylish design suitable for outdoor activities or casual wear.

products.title: Men's Tank Top
products.description: Comfortable tank top for men, made from soft, breathable cotton. Ideal for workouts, casual wear, or layering during hot weather.
